mythology_story: Unlike humans created from clay and angels created from light , jinn were created from "marij min nar " - a smokeless flame of fire. This fiery origin grants them unique properties: they can move at tremendous speeds, change forms, and exist in dimensions beyond normal human perception. Their creation predates humanity, as mentioned in the Quran : "And the jinn We created before from scorching fire" (15:27).
description: Also known as ðŸ•Œ The Jinn.
abilities: Shapeshifting: Can take various forms including animals (often snakes or dogs)
Invisibility: Normally invisible to humans unless they choose to appear
Great Speed: Can travel vast distances quickly
Strength: Physically stronger than humans in many cases
Longevity: Live for centuries, possibly millennia
name: The

habitat_info.description: This creature typically inhabits celestial/spiritual environments.
